The game looks beautiful and plays very much like the first\, but everything that made the previous game exceptional and an utter classic has been stripped from this game (except perhaps the music). It is not enjoyable to play unless you disregard every single cut scene and amputate the gameplay from the story and its completely dislikable characters. Even then\, what you are left with is a game that is stunning to look at but is nothing really special to play.
